actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the Secretaries of the military departments to order members of the Retired Reserve with over 20 years of continuous active duty and members of the Fleet Reserve and Fleet Marine Corps Reserve to active duty under the same conditions as are applicable to retired members of the regular components.

summary.text: Permits the Secretary of the military department concerned to order a member of the Retired Reserve who has completed at least 20 years of active service or a member of the Fleet Reserve or Fleet Marine Corps Reserve to active duty on the same basis as a retired member of the regular armed forces.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the Secretaries of the military departments to order members of the Retired Reserve with over 20 years of continuous active duty and members of the Fleet Reserve and Fleet Marine Corps Reserve to active duty under the same conditions as are applicable to retired members of the regular components.
